verbs.description: artificial intelligence [V: will] create as many jobs as it destroys according to a pwc analysis pwc forecast that ai would displace 20 jobs by 2037 but it would also create just as many jobs that suggests fears about robots rendering humans useless elon musk amnesty international pwc organisation for economic operation and development bill gates artificial intelligence
